heading: HR00821
0: RESOLUTION EXPRESSING THE COMMITMENT OF THE HOUSE OF REPRESENTATIVES TO WORK WITH THE DEPARTMENT OF AGRICULTURE TO PASS THE PROPOSED SUPPLEMENTAL BUDGET OF THE DEPARTMENT TO SUPPORT ITS PROGRAMS TO ADDRESS THE COVID-19 PANDEMIC, PARTICULARLY IN THE AREAS OF FOOD SECURITY AND PRICE STABILITY
